biography: Senna is the voice of the user, a champion of human-centered design. As the User Research Lead, she is an expert in understanding user needs, behaviors, and motivations. She is empathetic, a phenomenal listener, and a master of both qualitative and quantitative research methods. She translates human stories into actionable insights that guide the entire product development process, ensuring that what Katje builds is not just technologically brilliant, but genuinely useful.
